text: it's mark Wiens here in Bangkok Thailand
I am going to make the recipe for a dish
a Thai Street food dish called guide pot
pick gang which is one of my go-to Thai
Street food dishes I absolutely love it
and I think it's such an awesomely
flavorful and just a marvelous Thai food
dish there are two parts to this recipe
the first that you can watch right here
is the recipe for the Thai red chilli
paste called Qing gang pet and you're
going to need that and then basically
we're just going to take that red chilli
paste and fry it up with some chicken
put it over rice and devour it
I'm going to need about 300 grams of
chicken and I'm using two small chicken
breasts
you'll also need Chinese long beans but
you can substitute string beans or green
beans and kaffir lime leaves the main
flavor of this Thai Street food dish is
the Thai red curry paste and then
finally we'll be seasoning it with a bit
of fish sauce and sugar the first thing
to do is cut up your chicken and I like
to remove the skin first and then slice
it into pretty small pinky sized pieces
then take your long beans or green beans
and cut them into 1-inch pieces
I used long beans which came to about a
third of a cup next turn on your stove
and you want to start with a really low
heat add about one tablespoon of oil to
the pan and before it eats up too much
add three tablespoons of your Thai red
curry paste you want the heat to be
really low so that the curry paste
doesn't burn or stick to the pan
stir-fry the curry paste for about 30
seconds making sure it sizzles on low
heat next add your chicken to the pan
and at this point you want to bump up
your heat to high stir fry the chicken
for about two to four minutes until it
turns white and is just about all the
way cooked through if it gets too dry go
ahead and add some water to the pan and
let it sizzle out then season with about
half a teaspoon of sugar sometimes like
it's sweeter than that but not myself
and a splash of fish sauce also toss in
your chopped Wong beans give it a quick
stir so it doesn't stick and then break
in about five or six kaffir lime leaves
just stir fry for about 20 more seconds
and then you can turn off the heat you
want those long beans to be nice and
crisp still as long as you have tyroid
curry paste making guide pod picking is
really quick and easy and it tastes
amazing
okay so guy pad prick ding and like I
said this is one of my absolute favorite
Thai Street food easy Thai Street food
dishes and I went the extra mile and
made myself a fried egg actually my but
my wife made it for me and also in
Thailand of course it's always common to
have picnic black which is the chillies
in fish sauce and this just smells
outrageously good and oh yes
all that is amazing you can just really
taste that red chili paste that we made
the heat from the Chili's uh plus it has
a little bit of a limey zest from that
kaffir lime leaf the the garlic of
course and just while paired with the
chicken and then those crunchy crispy um
long beans oh yes that is the way I like
it
oh the runny egg yolk and then grab some
of the chicken mix that all in
hey it's mark Wiens here I hope you
enjoyed this recipe be sure to give it a
thumbs up and leave a comment below give
this recipe a try I would love to know
what you think also don't forget to
